Scheme.select: update t_task_detail set content ='#content#', attch_id='#attch_id#' where 1=1 [and task_detail_id='#task_detail_id#']

update t_task_detail set status ='#status#', process_content='#process_content#', process_attch_id='#process_attch_id#', end_time=[to_date('#end_time#','yyyy-MM-dd')] where 1=1 [and task_detail_id='#task_detail_id#']

select * from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY t.time asc) rn, t.task_id,t.create_user_id,t.create_project_id,t.root_id, (to_char(t.time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')) as time,(select user_name from t_user where user_id=t.create_user_id) as create_user_name, (select small_head from t_user where user_id=t.create_user_id) as create_user_head, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.create_project_id) as create_project_name, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.root_id) as root_project_name from t_task t where 1=1 [and root_id='#root_id#']) where 1=1 [and rn between '#start#'] [and '#end#']

select * from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY t.time asc) rn, t.task_id,t.create_user_id,t.create_project_id,t.root_id, (to_char(t.time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')) as time,(select user_name from t_user where user_id=t.create_user_id) as create_user_name, (select small_head from t_user where user_id=t.create_user_id) as create_user_head, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.create_project_id) as create_project_name, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.root_id) as root_project_name from t_task t where 1=1 [and root_id='#root_id#'] [and create_user_id='#user_id#']) where 1=1 [and rn between '#start#'] [and '#end#']

select * from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY t.time asc) rn, t.task_id,t.create_user_id,t.create_project_id,t.root_id, (to_char(t.time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')) as time,(select user_name from t_user where user_id=t.create_user_id) as create_user_name, (select small_head from t_user where user_id=t.create_user_id) as create_user_head, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.create_project_id) as create_project_name, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.root_id) as root_project_name, a.task_detail_id,a.process_user_id,a.process_project_id, a.content,a.attch_id,(to_char(a.start_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as start_time,(to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as end_time,a.status,a.process_content,a.process_attch_id, (select user_name from t_user where user_id=a.process_user_id) as process_user_name, (select small_head from t_user where user_id=a.process_user_id) as process_user_head, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=a.process_project_id) as process_project_name from t_task t inner join t_task_detail a on t.task_id=a.task_id where 1=1 [and t.root_id='#root_id#'] [and a.process_user_id='#user_id#']) where 1=1 [and rn between '#start#'] [and '#end#']

select t.task_detail_id,t.task_id,t.process_user_id,t.process_project_id, t.content,t.attch_id,(to_char(t.start_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as start_time,(to_char(t.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')) as end_time,t.status,t.process_content,t.process_attch_id, (select user_name from t_user where user_id=t.process_user_id) as process_user_name, (select small_head from t_user where user_id=t.process_user_id) as process_user_head, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.process_project_id) as process_project_name, a.create_user_id,a.create_project_id,a.root_id, (to_char(a.time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')) as time,(select user_name from t_user where user_id=a.create_user_id) as create_user_name, (select small_head from t_user where user_id=a.create_user_id) as create_user_head, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=a.create_project_id) as create_project_name, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=a.root_id) as root_project_name from t_task_detail t inner join t_task a on t.task_id=a.task_id where 1=1 [and t.task_id='#task_id#']
delete from t_task where 1=1 and [and task_id='#task_id#']
delete from t_task_detail where 1=1 and [and task_id='#task_id#']
